  16. (** Rewrite paths for reproducible builds

  18.   {b Warning:} this module is unstable and part of
  19.   {{!Compiler_libs}compiler-libs}.

  21.   See
  22.   {{: https://reproducible-builds.org/specs/build-path-prefix-map/ }
  23.   the BUILD_PATH_PREFIX_MAP spec}
  24. *)


  27. ‌type path = string
  28. ‌type path_prefix = string
  29. ‌type error_message = string

  31. ‌val encode_prefix : path_prefix -> string
  32. ‌val decode_prefix : string -> (path_prefix, error_message) result

  34. ‌type pair = { target: path_prefix; source : path_prefix }

  36. ‌val encode_pair : pair -> string
  37. ‌val decode_pair : string -> (pair, error_message) result

  39. ‌type map = pair option list

  41. ‌val encode_map : map -> string
  42. ‌val decode_map : string -> (map, error_message) result

  44. ‌val rewrite_first : map -> path -> path option
  45. (** [rewrite_first map path] tries to find a source in [map]
  46.     that is a prefix of the input [path]. If it succeeds,
  47.     it replaces this prefix with the corresponding target.
  48.     If it fails, it just returns [None]. *)

  50. ‌val rewrite_all : map -> path -> path list
  51. (** [rewrite_all map path] finds all sources in [map]
  52.     that are a prefix of the input [path]. For each matching
  53.     source, in priority order, it replaces this prefix with
  54.     the corresponding target and adds the result to
  55.     the returned list.
  56.     If there are no matches, it just returns [[]]. *)

  58. ‌val rewrite : map -> path -> path
  59. (** [rewrite path] uses [rewrite_first] to try to find a
  60.     mapping for path. If found, it returns that, otherwise
  61.     it just returns [path]. *)
